reviewtext: I purchased this brand of cassette tape recorder because I've bought Panasonic cassette recorders in the past and have been very pleased with them.  If used properly, this recorder is quite durable, although it's not as portable as pocket recorders.  The sound quality is good.  I only use it for lectures and not for music.  I'm happy that it's still available.
summary: A very good quality cassette recorder!
